feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [GRA2/RBX8][Dedicated Servers] - Multiple racks maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 29, 2026, 01:00 - 05:00 UTC

Nov 25, 01:09 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Dedicated Servers offer, affecting servers in racks G253B04, G262E01, G251B04, G244B04, G251A10, G253B10 and R806L03.

Start time : 29/01/2026 01:00 UTC
End time : 29/01/2026 05:00 UTC
Service impact : vRack network will be temporarily unavailable up to 1 hour during the maintenance for servers in the specified racks.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing a maintenance on multiple network equipment.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX3][Dedicated Servers] - Racks 46C02 - 46C03 incident notification
entry.content:
Nov 25, 16:45 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Dedicated Servers offering, which was causing temporary availability issue in the racks 46C02 - 46C03 has been resolved.

Start time : 25/11/2025 09:52 UTC
End time : 25/11/2025 16:37 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a cooling system issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : Most of servers are operational in rack 46C03.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
